description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Chat' that provides a chat interface with search and reference insertion capabilities via connectors. It manages user input, search triggers, display of search results, and insertion of selected references. The component integrates remote search via connectors based on '@jira_' or '@confluence_' prefixes within the chat input.

methods.name: Chat
methods.description: React functional component implementing chat input with connector-based search suggestions.
